special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 ft. of the mephit must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) fire damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The mephit can innately cast blur, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.desc: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
